components.gen_modal_basic_id(id: str)[source]

Generates the zoom Modal style Basic Dash Objects withe the Correct ID

Parameters

id – The Id to Specify the Components for Dash Callbacks

Returns

Zoom Modal Dash Object List

components.gen_modal_option_id(id: str)[source]

Generates the Zoom Modal Obtions where the Inteative Components will be set

Parameters

id – The Id to Specify the Components for Dash Callbacks

Returns

Modal Components withe the base for the Inteactive parts

components.correct_input_div(variable, value, priors, id, **kwargs)[source]

Generate a Dash Componant for the Varibael, that can be used in the zoom Modal

Parameters

  • variable – The Variabel wich is be displayed

  • value – The Value of the Variable chosen from the User

  • priors – the Priors of the modael

  • kwargs – further specifation for the Dash Componant

Returns

a Dash Componant that displays the variable

components.generate_correct_plots(variable, var, result)[source]
components.generate_modal_option(model: jpt.trees.JPT, var: str, value: List[str or int or float], priors, id)[source]

Creates a modal for Zoom for a chosen Variabel, the Style is static

Parameters

  • model – the model of the Tree

  • var – the Variabel wiche will be displayed

  • value – the User chosen Values from the Varibale

  • priors – the Priors pre calculatet

  • id – id from Modal will be modal_input_id because the callbacks cant be duplicated

Returns

Zoom Modal for the Variabel in var

components.create_range_slider(minimum: float, maximum: float, *args, **kwargs) → dash.dcc.RangeSlider[source]

Generate a RangeSlider that resembles a continuous set.

Parameters

  • minimum – lowest number possible in the Range of the slider (left-Side)

  • maximum – the Highest number possible in the Range of the slider (right-Side)

  • args – Further styling for plotly dash components

  • kwargs – Further styling for plotly dash components

Returns

The slider as dcc component

components.fuse_overlapping_range(ranges: List) → List[source]
components.div_to_variablemap(model: jpt.trees.JPT, variables: List, constrains: List) → jpt.variables.VariableMap[source]

Transforms variable and Constrains List form the GUI to a VariableMap

Parameters

  • model – the JPT model of the Prob. Tree

  • variables – The list of chosen Variables

  • constrains – The list of for the Variables on the same Index

Returns

VariableMap of the Variables with its associated Constraints

components.mpe_result_to_div(model: jpt.trees.JPT, res: jpt.trees.VariableMap, likelihood: float) → List[source]

Generate Visuel Dash Representation for result of the mpe jpt func

Parameters

  • res – one of the Results from mpe func

  • likelihood – The likelihood of the maxima

Returns

Children’s List from Dash Components to display the Results in res

Creates Dash Style Prefix for the query GUI

Parameters

  • len_fac_q – Length of Query input used for Scaling

  • len_fac_e – Length of Evidence input used for Scaling

Returns

Children div for the prefix query GUI

components.generate_free_variables_from_div(model: jpt.trees.JPT, variable_div: List) → List[str][source]

Peels the names out of variable_div elements and uses generate_free_variables_from_list for the Return

Parameters

  • model – the JPT model of the Prob. Tree

  • variable_div – List of all Variabels that are being Used, in Dash Dropdown Class saved

Returns

Returns List of String from the Names of all not used Variabels.

components.generate_free_variables_from_list(model: jpt.trees.JPT, variable_list: List[str]) → List[str][source]

Deletes all used Variable Names out of a List of all Variables Names.

Parameters

  • model – the JPT model of the Prob. Tree

  • variable_list – the List of in use Variable Names

Returns

List of Variable Names that are not in use

components.update_free_vars_in_div(model: jpt.trees.JPT, variable_div: List) → List[source]

Updates the Variable Options for a Dash Dropdown for choosing Variables, to all not in use Variables.

Parameters

  • model – the JPT model of the Prob. Tree

  • variable_div – the Div to update the Options

Returns

the Div withe updated variable Options

components.reduce_index(index, number, list) → List[source]

Reduces the index in id from index in the list about the amount number

Parameters

  • index – the start index to decrease the index

  • number – the amount to decrease

  • list – the List from Dash Components that should be decreased

Returns

list with the decreased index implemented

components.del_selector_from_div(model: jpt.trees.JPT, variable_div: List, constrains_div: List, del_index: int)[source]

Deletes a Row from the Option + Constrains and Rebuilds all Choices for Variables

Parameters

  • model – the JPT model of the Prob. Tree

  • variable_div – list of Components to Chose Variable in the GUI

  • constrains_div – list of Components that are the Constraints for the Variables on the Same Index

  • del_index – the Value on what Position the to delete Row is.

Returns

Variable Children and Constrains Children for the GUI withe Update options

components.del_selector_from_div_button(model: jpt.trees.JPT, variable_div: List, constrains_div: List, option_div: List, del_index: int)[source]

Deletes a Row from the Option + Constrains and Rebuilds all Choices for Variables

Parameters

  • model – the JPT model of the Prob. Tree

  • variable_div – list of Components to Chose Variable in the GUI

  • constrains_div – list of Components that are the Constraints for the Variables on the Same Index

  • del_index – the Value on what Position the to delete Row is.

Returns

Variable Children and Constrains Children for the GUI withe Update options

components.add_selector_to_div(model: jpt.trees.JPT, variable_div: List, constrains_div: list, type: str, index: int)[source]

Genrats the Correct Selector Components for the div

Parameters

  • model – the JPT model of the Prob. Tree

  • variable_div – list of Components to Chose Variable in the GUI

  • constrains_div – list of Components that are the Constraints for the Variables on the Same Index

  • type – the Type of the Component for the ID

  • index – the index Number of the Component for the ID

Returns

Variable Children and Constrains Children for the GUI withe one more Row

components.add_selector_to_div_button(model: jpt.trees.JPT, variable_div, constrains_div, option_div, type: str, index: int)[source]

Parameters

  • model – the JPT model of the Prob. Tree

  • variable_div – list of Components to Chose Variable in the GUI

  • constrains_div – list of Components that are the Constraints for the Variables on the Same Index

  • type – the Type of the Component for the ID

  • index – the index Number of the Component for the ID

Returns

Variable Children and Constrains Children for the GUI withe one more Row

Parameters

  • type – What Type of ID it is

Returns

Parameters

  • type – What Type of ID it is

Returns

components.plot_symbolic_distribution(distribution: jpt.distributions.univariate.Multinomial) → plotly.graph_objects.Bar[source]

generates a Bar graph for symbolic distribution in jpt.

Parameters

distribution – the Distribution for the Bar Diagram

Returns

the trace of a Bar Diagram for the symbolic variable.

components.plot_numeric_pdf(distribution: jpt.distributions.univariate.Numeric, padding=0.1) → plotly.graph_objects.Scatter[source]

generates a jpt plot from a numeric variable

Parameters

  • distribution – the Distribution of the variable for the Plot

  • padding – for the ends of the Plot, it is for visibility.

Returns

scatter plot for the numeric variable

components.plot_numeric_cdf(distribution: jpt.distributions.univariate.Numeric, padding=0.1) → plotly.graph_objects.Scatter[source]

generates a cdf plot from a numeric variable

Parameters

  • distribution – the Distribution of the variable for the Plot

  • padding – for the ends of the Plot, it is for visibility.

Returns

scatter plot for the numeric variable

components.plot_numeric_to_div(var_name: List, result) → List[source]

Generates a Div where both plots are in for a numeric variable

Parameters

  • var_name – the name of variable that will be plotted

  • result – the result generate from jpt.

Returns

one div withe 2 Plots in.

components.plot_symbolic_to_div(var_name: str, result) → List[source]

generates a div where a bar Diagram for a Symbolic Variable.

Parameters

  • var_name – the name of the variable

  • result – the result generate from jpt

Returns

a div withe one bar diagram in it.

components.gen_Nav_pages(pages, toIgnoreName)[source]

Genartes the Navigation Page Links, withe out the toIgnoreNames

Parameters

  • pages – All Pages that are in the GUI

  • toIgnoreName – Names of Pages that shouldnt be displayed (Empty)

Returns
